org.cougaar.core.blackboard
Class Blackboard

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.blackboard.Subscriber
      org.cougaar.core.blackboard.Blackboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlackboardClient, BlackboardServesDomain, PrivilegedClaimant
public class Blackboard
extends Subscriber
implements BlackboardServesDomain, BlackboardClient, PrivilegedClaimant

A Subscriber created by the StandardBlackboard that maintains a view of all published objects, invokes Domain LogicProviders, and monitors community membership changes.

getBlackboardSize

receiveMessages

public final Envelope receiveMessages(java.util.List msgs)
Process incoming directive messages. All messages have been blessed by the message manager. The messages are implicitly acknowledged by this method. The envelope of published events resulting from handling the messages is returned.

prepareForEnvelopes

public final void prepareForEnvelopes()
called by distributor to prepare for "receiveEnvelope(..)" calls.

receiveEnvelope

public final Envelope receiveEnvelope(Envelope envelope)
Called by transaction close within the thread of Plugins. Also called at the end of an LP pseudo-transaction, but most of the logic here is disabled in that case.
